about_the_game:
Be careful around strangers today…



At Nari’s school, everyone is talking about a mysterious chat room that posts eerily accurate horoscopes—foretelling events before they happen with chilling precision. The enigma of who writes these predictions only deepens the intrigue.

But when the predictions turn dark and murders start occurring, Nari realizes the horoscopes might be more than just creepy coincidences. As the deadly patterns unfold, Nari must uncover the truth before the next prediction is about her.

Who is behind the chilling forecasts, and can Nari escape becoming the next victim? Dive into a suspenseful web of secrets and lies where every forecast could be your last!






Get Ready for a Thrilling Throwback with Super Chillers: The Chat Room!

Dive into a nostalgic point-and-click adventure that’s dripping with suspense and retro charm. Explore eerie locations, encounter a host of quirky characters, and solve mind-bending puzzles – but beware, the killer is always lurking!

Inspired by classic YA horror series like Fear Street and Point Horror, Super Chillers delivers a campy, spine-tingling experience straight from the 1990s. Are you ready to relive the chills and thrills? The clock is ticking, and the horror is just beginning.

content_descriptors.notes: This game has a campy slasher horror theme. There will be cartoon violence, death, and blood.

name: Super Chillers: The Chat Room

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Vista or higher
  • Processor: 1.6 Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256mb
  • Storage: 250 MB available space

Drogas ilícitas
Linguagem imprópria
Atos criminosos

short_description: Travel back to the 90s in this campy point-and-click horror adventure inspired by classic YA horror books like Fear Street and Point Horror.
